title: Purchase of a Land for Expansion of Development Activities of the  Wayamba University of Sri Lanka
decision_details: - the Wayamba University consists of four Faculties and 16 departments of study. It is intended to gradually increase the intake of students for the Faculty of Business Studies and Finance as well as for the Faculty of Applied Science and it is planned to admit 100 students in 2016 under the recently introduced Technological subject stream under a separate Department of study.  The proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, to purchase the block of land situated at Kuliyapitiya, adjoining the University, for future development activities needed to the University, was approved by the Cabinet.
